Título: Vive a un paso del corredor Insurgentes, a 3 mins de la Universidad Panamericana y disfruta de la maravilla de irte caminando a todos lados! Consta de espaciosa estancia con sala/comedor, 3 cómodas recámaras, la principal con vestidor y baño integrado más 2 recámaras secundarias con clóset que comparten baño entre sí y con el área social. Cuenta con una hermosa cocina integral equipada con barras de granito, cuarto de lavado y 2 estacionamientos techados y designados. Ubicación privilegiada frente a una pintoresca plaza en una zona tradicional de la ciudad, pero a la vez de las principales vías rápidas de la zona. Mantenimiento incluido y con excelentes amenidades como son: amplias áreas verdes, terrazas y roof garden en la casa club; alberca techada y jacuzzi; gimnasio y salón de spinning; baños, vestidores, spa y área de masaje; precioso vestíbulo de acceso; vigilancia 24/7, cctv y sistemas de detección de humos y contra incendios. Aprovecha esta súper oportunidad. Llama hoy mismo y agenda un tour, que no te lo ganen! Expert estate. Live just a stone's throw from the Insurgentes corridor, 3 minutes from Panamerican University, and enjoy the wonder of walking everywhere! This exclusive, spacious, and bright like-new 104 m2 living space apartment, features a wonderful balcony of almost 5 m2 and magnificent panoramic views of the entire city. Located on the 19th of 24 floors, in Enquentro, exclusive development unique in Mexico, that combines classic elegance with a modern style. It consists of a spacious living/dining room, 3 comfortable bedrooms, the master with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom, plus 2 secondary bedrooms with closets that share a bathroom with the social area. It features a beautiful fitted kitchen with granite countertops, a laundry room, and 2 designated covered parking spaces. This prime location faces a picturesque plaza in a traditional part of the city, yet is also close to the main expressways. Maintenance is included and the building offers excellent amenities such as: large green areas, terraces, and a roof garden at the clubhouse; an indoor pool and jacuzzi; a gym and spinning room; Bathrooms, changing rooms, a spa and massage area; a beautiful entrance hall; 24/7 security, cctv, and smoke and fire detection systems. Take advantage of this fantastic opportunity. Call today and schedule a tour; don't miss it out! Expert estate
